On this page

Security ​

This page contains things related to security on your android device.

Online Analysis Tools ​

REMEMBER!!

You should always scan files (like APKs) that you download with one or more of these tools!

  • ⭐ VirusTotal
  • Hybrid Analysis
  • Kaspersky Cloud
  • Pithus

Anti-Virus / Anti-Malware Apps ​

  • ⭐ Malwarebytes Security
  • Bitdefender
  • Hypatia

Firewalls ​

  • ⭐ NetGuard

Permission Managers ​

  • TrackerControl
  • Exodus
  • HideDroid
  • Permission Pilot

Browsers ​

???

This is different to the Adblocking browsers you can find here.

  • ⭐ Mull
  • ⭐ Tor Browser - Onion Browser
  • Ceno Browser - Proxy Browser

Network ​

  • PCAPdroid, Keep It Up - Network Monitoring
